text:
preparations() {
    cat <<-EOF >> "$HOME"/.bashrc

        export s_a="/etc/nginx/sites-available"
        export s_e="/etc/nginx/sites-enabled"
        export drt="/var/www/html"
        source "$HOME"/"$repo"/software_internal.sh
    EOF
    source "$HOME"/.bashrc 2>/dev/null
}
preparations
